puṇyam tat eva labhate sakalam viṣuva īrcanāt

original: p. 128) etadeva ca vijñeyaṃ grahaṇe cottarāyaṇe ||
analyzed: etat eva ca vijñeyam grahaṇe ca uttarāyaṇe
kārtikyām ca yuga ādyāyām ṣaḍaśītyām viśeṣataḥ
yaḥ tu kṛṣṇa caturdaśyām snātvā devam pinākinam
ārādhayet dvijaśreṣṭha tasya na asti punarbhavaḥ

original: phalānāṃ dve sahasre tu mahāsnānaṃ prakīrtitam |
analyzed: phalānām dve sahasre tu mahāsnānam prakīrtitam
mṛd tāmra hema raupyaiḥ ca koṭi koṭi guṇam kramāt
atra anyat api

original: jalajānāṃ tu puṣpāṇāṃ bilvapatrasya caiva hi |
analyzed: jala jānām tu puṣpāṇām bilva patrasya ca eva hi
eṣām paryuṣitā śaṅkā kāryā pañca dina ūrdhvatas
kaṇakāni kadambāni rātrau deyāni śaṅkare
divā śeṣāṇi ca anyāni divārātrau ca mallikā
alābhe ca eva puṣpāṇām patrāṇi api nivedayet
phalānām api abhāve tu tṛṇa gulmau nivedayet
eteṣām api abhāve tu bhaktyā bhavati pūjitaḥ
svayam patita puṣpāṇi tyajet upahatāni ca

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye puṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti jaḍabuddhayaḥ ||
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tu ye puṣpam gṛhṇanti jaḍa buddhayaḥ
devatāḥ tat na gṛhṇanti na ca api pitaraḥ tathā
mukulena arcayet ca evam apakvam na nivedayet
phalam vyathita pakvam tu yatnāt pakvam parityajet
ghṛtena tila tailena tathā ca eva oṣadhī rasaiḥ
dīpam prajvālya deveśe bhaktyā svarga patiḥ bhavet
tat yathā bhakṣyate bhakṣyam tat tathā eva nivedayet
anyathā tad pradānena na tat phalam avāpnuyāt
sakṛt uccāritaḥ yena mantraḥ paṃca akṣaraḥ śubhaḥ
sapta janma kṛtāt pāpāt mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā ||
analyzed: apavitraḥ pavitraḥ vā sarva avasthām gataḥ api vā
mahāpātaka yuktaḥ api mantrasya asya japāt śuciḥ

original: p. 129) kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ bhaktyā śivasyāyatanaṃ naraḥ ||
analyzed: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam bhaktyā śivasya āyatanam naraḥ
aśvamedha sahasrasya śreṣṭhasya labhate phalam
namaskāreṇa yā urcayet

original: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi |
analyzed: sa yām gatim avāpnoti na tām kratu śataiḥ api
tīrtha koṭi sahasrāṇi yajña koṭi śatāni ca
mahādeva praṇāmasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm
yajñopavīta vāsāṃsi ghaṇṭā vyajana cāmarāḥ
go bhūmi dāsī nagaram grāma udyāna dhvaja ādikam
da tvā kalpa kṣayam yāvat śivasya anucaraḥ bhavet
mṛddāruṇa iṣṭike śaile yaḥ vai kuryāt śiva ālayam
triḥsapta kula saṃyuktam śiva loke mahīyate
liṅga pratiṣṭhām kṛtvā tu kula koṭīḥ samuddharet
śiva kṣetra samīpa sthaḥ sarvāḥ nadyaḥ dvijottama
vāpī kūpa taḍāgāḥ ca śiva gaṃgāḥ iti smṛtāḥ
gaṃgā snāna samam tatra snānāt puṇyam udāhṛtam

original: tatra deśe tu durbhikṣaṃ na ca māro pravartate |
analyzed: tatra deśe tu durbhikṣam na ca māro pravartate

original: nākāle mriyate kaścit pūjyate yatra śaṅkaraḥ ||
analyzed: na akāle mriyate kaścid pūjyate yatra śaṅkaraḥ
kaścid kiñcid yadā paśyet śiva liṃgam apūjitam

original: tadā sampūjya yo gacchetsa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||
analyzed: tadā sampūjya yaḥ gacchet sa yāti paramām gatim
ciram paryuṣitam mālyam śivasya apanayet tu yaḥ
go sahasra phalam tasya bhavati iha na saṃśayaḥ
go bhū hiraṇya vastra ādi bali pūjā nivedane
jñeyaḥ namaḥ śivāya iti mantraḥ sarva artha sādhakaḥ
sarva mantra adhikaḥ ca ayam oṅkāra ādyaḥ ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ
tad mantra jāpī tad karma rataḥ tad gata mānasaḥ
niṣkāmaḥ puruṣaḥ rājan sa rudra padam aśnute
iti śiva māhātmya varṇanam
samāptaḥ ayam granthaḥ
